Using computed properties
Persisting state
#Create the store

posts.title: Marianna
posts.body: Another interesting property of thunks is that any value that is returned from a thunk will be provided to the caller - i.e. where it was dispatched from. Therefore if you were using async/await, or returned a Promise, from your thunk the caller would be able to chain off the returned Promise to know when the thunk has completed
